zh.title: 快速开始
zh.content: 本指南将帮助你快速了解 DNS 文档系统的基本使用方法。

zh.title: 安装配置
zh.content: 详细介绍如何安装和配置 DNS 服务。

zh.title: DNS 概述
zh.content: DNS 域名系统的基本概念和工作原理介绍。

zh.title: 记录类型
zh.content: 常见 DNS 记录类型详解：A、AAAA、CNAME、MX、TXT 等。

en.title: Getting Started
en.content: This guide will help you get started with the DNS documentation system.

en.title: Installation
en.content: Learn how to install and configure DNS services.

en.title: DNS Overview
en.content: Introduction to DNS concepts and how it works.

en.title: Record Types
en.content: Detailed explanation of DNS record types: A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, etc.
